overview: A year in the life of CEO, NAACP ambassador, Duke University professor, husband, father, son and Grammy Award winning producer 9th Wonder. Cole, Murs, Phonte, Sha Money XL, Young Guru, The Alchemist & more.
title: The Wonder Year
